class.comment: Server information sent to the client for display in the multiplayer menu.

getMotd.comment: Gets the message of the day.

getServerVersion.comment: Gets the server version it is running on.

return.comment: The number of players on the server.

getPlayerCount.comment: Gets the number of players online.

return.comment: The maximum number of players allowed.

getMaxPlayers.comment: Gets the maximum number of players allowed on the server.
